item.description:
This photoshoot is all about love and the preferred colors are red and white.

Lighting:

There will be two setup areas:

1) Strobe lighting - Speedotron + Photoflex Octodome Softboxes (7 feet & 5 feet diameter). I have one set of pocket wizard so if you have a transmit module then please bring it along otherwise you need to take turn to use the one I have. With this lighting I have my camera and lens setup to : ISO=200, WB=5500K to 6000K, f-stop=8, Speed=60.

2) Continuous lighting - Photoflex Starlight and Altman stage lights. With this lighting, you need fast lens (or bring your fill in flash). You need to preset WB according to the lighting. Will help you to setup if you need it.

Back drop will be grey or black or white.

Props (email me if you have any items from the following list):

I will buy some red roses and bring champagne glasses to the studio But I need your help. Please bring the following if you have them:

We need some HEART shapes (can’t do a Valentine shoot without this)

We need more flowers (any flowers that you would like to use for prop)

We need dark red fabric (velvet would be best)

We need lace (Black, red or antique lace)


Make up artist:  Shelley Robinson

Hair Stylist:       Amanda Ortiz

Models (4 girls and 1 boy):

 Kay K. + M. J., Caitlyn L., Amanda, Caitlin E.

 

Notes:

  1. If you would like to take photo of someone, you allow having one guest but you need to email me separately because the event will not allow you add in your guest (your guest should not be a photographer and your guest needs to pay extra for the MUA cost).
  2. Please pay within 5 days after you make RSVP.
item.name: Valentine Photoshoot
